plot: In February 1991, the unsuspecting and remote Scottish island was hit by co-ordinated dawn raids, police and social workers swooping without warning on four Orkney families and taking their nine children into care. Extraordinary allegations of Satanic ritual abuse had been made and an extraordinary fight ensued to have the children returned and the families' names cleared.   Written by  GM. BBC Press Office
title: The Accused
